data.name: Steam Ocean
data.detailed_description: This game uses Unity + Oculus jointly developed a VR3D type of shooting game, players need to use OculusVR device to connect after opening this game, this game is VR panoramic 3D type, players will come to the first level after starting the game, players need to use the handle to pick up the gun to destroy the monsters in the scene, when the player destroys a monster will add a point, when the destroyed monster reaches a certain score, the game will open the second level, The difficulty of the second level is often more difficult than the first level, so take up the weapon in your hand and destroy the monsters in the sci-fi scene!
data.about_the_game: This game uses Unity + Oculus jointly developed a VR3D type of shooting game, players need to use OculusVR device to connect after opening this game, this game is VR panoramic 3D type, players will come to the first level after starting the game, players need to use the handle to pick up the gun to destroy the monsters in the scene, when the player destroys a monster will add a point, when the destroyed monster reaches a certain score, the game will open the second level, The difficulty of the second level is often more difficult than the first level, so take up the weapon in your hand and destroy the monsters in the sci-fi scene!
data.short_description: This game uses Oculus equipment and Unity development of a VR3D science fiction gunfight game, players need to pick up the weapon to kill the sea monsters generated in the scene, intense and exciting gunfight game, players each kill a monster scene counter opportunities to increase

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 英特尔酷睿 i5-4590/ AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 英特尔酷睿 i7/ AMD 5600X 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
